column4: My sound sounds crappy. Too much treble, any ideas on how to change this?
This sound problem didn't exist under the previous version of ubuntu.
the mixer controls seem to work fine, but my card doesn't seem to have tone control, or alsa seems to think so, so I can't adjust them.
problem first occurred after Breezy upgrade?
yes. My sound was great till then.
I didn't have tone control under the previous version either.
do you have any other OS installed?
nope. All my machines run some version of linux.
any live CD's lying around? Knoppix, Kanotix, DSL?
how's the sound if you boot from that?
I'll download the latest version and give it a spin. It would eliminate any hardware problems, as well as possible 2.6 kernel problems.
